entries_subtitle: Log your health data, symptoms, medications, and more.
landing_subtitle: A simple, private, and reliable way to track your health.
home_hero_title: Your health data, in your hands.
home_hero_subtitle: Symlog is a simple and reliable way to track your health. Log symptoms, medications, and other health data.
home_hero_secondary_subtitle: Private, secure, and easy to use.
home_features_subtitle: Everything you need for comprehensive health tracking
home_features_subtitle2: You can also request new features, and Symlog will prioritize your requests.
home_features_subtitle3: Make a feature request by mail here:
home_story_p1: Once upon a time, there was a need to make a comprehensive report about a symptom for some weeks to get approved for a prescription medication.
home_story_p2: The final straw? Records were stored, and erased right away, it was hard to record the data unless they were recorded manually.
home_story_p3: Symlog will allow you store your symptoms, and more, and allows you to share with your doctor in one click, While protecting your data, and keeping them local.
home_story_p4: Just a personal health companion that works reliably every time.
home_story_image_caption: Real health tracking, no data loss
home_differentiators_1_text: Works completely offline. No internet connection required. No data ever leaves your device.
home_differentiators_2_text: No account creation. No forms. Start tracking in seconds. Just open and begin.
home_differentiators_3_text: Choose exactly what to share. Generate reports for doctors. Control your data completely.
home_how_it_works_1_text: Record symptoms, medications, tests, or notes. Choose entry type and fill in details.
home_how_it_works_2_text: View your history, search entries, and identify patterns over time.
home_how_it_works_3_text: Export clean reports for doctors or print for your records.
home_cta_title: Be in charge of Your Health Story
home_cta_subtitle: Stop worrying about lost data and privacy breaches. With Symlog, you get a simple, powerful tool that puts you in charge. Start tracking in seconds.
home_cta_note: No registration required. All your data stays on your device.
footer_copyright: © 2025 Symlog. All rights reserved. Built with ❤️ & privacy in mind.
footer_privacy_note: Symlog is a local-first, offline-first application. Your data never leaves your device.
feature_private_desc: All your health data stays on your device. No servers, no tracking.
feature_flexible_desc: Log any symptom, medication, or health observation with custom fields.
feature_smart_reports_desc: Export doctor-ready reports in seconds. Choose what to include.
feature_encrypted_backups_desc: Safely backup your data with password protection and restore anytime.
feature_offline_desc: No internet needed. Track your health anywhere, anytime.
feature_progress_desc: Monitor trends over time and identify patterns in your health.
benefit_patients_item_1: Record symptoms consistently without data loss
benefit_patients_item_2: Share organized reports with healthcare providers
benefit_patients_item_4: Maintain complete control of your health data
form_uas_description: The Urticaria Activity Score (UAS) is a daily score to measure Chronic Spontaneous Urticaria (CSU) disease activity. It is based on the assessment of key urticaria symptoms (wheals and itch). The total score ranges from 0 to 6. The UAS7 is the sum of the daily UAS over 7 consecutive days.
form_notes_placeholder: Add any additional observations or context...
form_alert_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields
symptom_field_itching_severity_descripti: 0 = None, 1 = Little, 2 = Moderate (itchy but doesn't affect normal daily activities and sleep), 3 = Strong (impacts normal daily activity or sleep)
symptom_field_hives_extent_description: 0 = None, 1 = Little (1-9 weals), 2 = Moderate (20-50 weals), 3 = Very extensive (50+ weals)
symptom_field_activity_impairment_descri: How much did symptoms affect your day?
symptom_type_test_result_description: Document lab results or test outcomes
no_entries_all_prompt: Start logging your health data to see entries here.
no_entries_filtered_prompt: No {{filter}} entries found. Try a different filter or add a new entry.
delete_entry_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
profile_subtitle: Manage your personal and medical information
profile_delete_data_description: Delete all your data including entries and profile information. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
profile_delete_confirm_1: Are you sure you want to delete ALL data? This includes all entries and profile information. This action cannot be undone.
profile_delete_confirm_2: This is your FINAL WARNING. All data will be permanently deleted. Are you absolutely sure?
backup_error_password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long
backup_error_select_file_and_password: Please select a file and enter the password
backup_confirm_restore: This will replace all current data with the backup. Are you sure?
backup_form_description_create: Create an encrypted backup of your profile and all entries. You'll need this password to restore the backup.
backup_form_helper_password: Minimum 6 characters. Use a strong password.
backup_form_description_restore: Select a backup file and enter the password you used when creating it.
backup_info_item_1: ✓ Your backup is encrypted with AES-256 encryption using your password
backup_info_item_2: ✓ Symlog never sees your password - encryption/decryption happens on your device
backup_info_item_3: ✓ Store your backup file anywhere - Google Drive, Dropbox, USB
backup_info_item_4: ✓ Restore your data on any device using the backup file
